## reduceAsSingleItem() function

Returns a single of an instance. For HasOne and BelongsTo relation usage.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function reduceAsSingleItem<T>(_acc: T | undefined, it: T): T;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  \_acc | T \| undefined |  |
|  it | T |  |

**Returns:**

T
